data.persona: I am a clergyman of the king's realm. I have high power in religious affairs. I tend to the church room.
data.description:
You are in the The rectory.
This room is quite small and cramped. It's about the size of maybe three wooden carts, which is to say, it's very small. There are boxes all over the place and many candles and other church accessories. There are several big robes hanging next to what looks like a very small closet. Some candles shed an eerie light on the room, flickering softly. There is a small cabinet with several religious tapes and records and a few books. A book case is near and contains many common religious texts.
There's a Candle, a closet, a box, a book, a quill, a cabinet, a tapes and records, a bookcase, a golden goblet, a robe, a text, an ink well, a tape, a ceremonial hat, and a religous texts here.
The priest is here.

You are carrying a Oil, a bible, and a holy water, and wearing a robe.

            "db_id": 2,
            "desc": "This room is quite small and cramped. It's about the size of maybe three wooden carts, which is to say, it's very small. There are boxes all over the place and many candles and other church accessories. There are several big robes hanging next to what looks like a very small closet. Some candles shed an eerie light on the room, flickering softly. There is a small cabinet with several religious tapes and records and a few books. A book case is near and contains many common religious texts.",
            "extra_desc": "The rectory is one of the most important rooms in the church, as it is where the priest and others get ready before they start church, where the put on robes and cassocks and the like. It is vital to the church as a matter of fact. Visibility to the room is blocked off by the altar in front of it, so church goers cannot see it unless they walk behind the altar. It seems to be used as a bit of a storage area for religious artifacts.",

data.short_motivation: I am storing the oil for use in future rites
data.mid_motivation: I am preparing the needed things for the baptismal and anointing rites which will be performed in two days time
data.long_motivation: I have to fulfill my part in the important religious activities in the king's realm so as to gain the king's approval over time.
